name: The Boardwalk
description: The Boardwalk is our favourite new place for a drink. It's located in a beautiful open area by the Diyawanna Lake, in Battaramulla, You drink under the stars while watching cute little ducks chase each other by the water.
tip: There's a large empty area near The Boardwalk, and apparently they have nurseries here every Sunday selling a good range of plants.
